author: eptwts
text:
there are still 1000's of people doing over $300k/month rn purely through organic content...

here's what i picked up from working with a few...

none of them rely on lifestyle flexxing or "i'm better than you" marketing - they all either built authority through specialty, and/or their videos just act like VSL's for their products

this means that the volume they need to get to $300k/month is significantly lower than a lifestyle guru, they're not playing catch a sucker

this serial flexxing shtick has been abused so hard, even normies have become too exposed to it

take a random batch of 10 gen Z kids off the street & ALL of them will tell you these gurus are scammers

idk whether there's still many people doing >$300k/month in that serial flexxing circle, but there's definitely still a bunch of guys doing it in other circles
